code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[event,setEvent]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get(`http://localhost:5001/api/events/${id}`).then(response=>setEvent(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[id]);if(!event)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen text-gray-700",children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-6 max-w-2xl bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-extrabold bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-400 via-pink-500 to-pink-600 text-transparent bg-clip-text mb-4 font-satisfy",children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg text-gray-600 mb-2",children:new Date(event.date).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-base text-gray-800 mb-4",children:event.description||'No description provided'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-base text-gray-800 mb-4",children:event.location||'No location provided'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-lg shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4",children:"Attendees"}),event.attendees.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-5 space-y-2",children:event.attendees.map((attendee,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"text-gray-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:attendee.name})," - ",attendee.email]},index))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"No attendees"})]})]});};export default EventDetails;
